Educational Handouts

Comprehensive collection of teaching resources integrating mātauranga Māori with contemporary learning
Explore our extensive library of professionally designed handouts that honor indigenous knowledge while delivering educational excellence. Each resource is carefully crafted to support New Zealand curriculum outcomes.
"Mā te mātauranga, ka ora" Through knowledge comes wellbeing
✨

26 New Culturally-Integrated Handouts!

Fresh resources combining STEM, literacy, and mātauranga Māori. Ready to print and use!

Explore New Handouts →

Browse Handouts

🌿 Cultural Context | Horopaki Ahurea

Whakataukī

"Ko te akoranga te pūtake o te ora"

"Education is the foundation of wellbeing"

🏛️ Connection to Mangakōtukutuku College Values

Whaimana: Integrity - Standing firm in truth and principle

This learning connects to the value of whaimana by encouraging students to [engage with content in ways that embody this value].

🛡️ Cultural Safety Considerations

  • Approach Māori content with respect and openness
  • Recognize students' diverse cultural backgrounds and experiences
  • Create space for Māori students to share their perspectives
  • Consult with whānau and local iwi for culturally sensitive topics

Explore mathematical concepts through traditional Māori games and cultural practices.

Years 9-10 Mathematics

Chemistry of Traditional Māori Medicine

Discover the scientific principles behind traditional Māori healing practices and natural remedies.

Years 11-13 Science

Geometric Patterns in Māori Art and Architecture

Mathematical analysis of traditional Māori geometric design and architectural principles.

Years 9-10 Mathematics
